long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your Comprehension on the Web!

Pebble is an AI-powered active reading companion that helps you actively read, watch and memorize!

Extension Features include:
- Embedded AI questions to check if you're actively reading
- Web highlights & notes
- Document Q/A for websites
- Live AI generated questions while watching YouTube videos
- Saving questions, highlights and notes to memory for spaced repetition AI quizzes on the associated website
